body: Side note on the crime part, it's only a crime to cheat if your married, intend to marry or date with the intention to marry. In short being married and cheating is always a crime, cheating on a fiance is also a crime and if your dating and have made your surroundings aware that your dating with the intention to marry then it's also a crime. From what I could find out the intention to marry can either be done by letting both families know and/or doing a small ceremony or you can simply announce it to enough people so that it becomes "common knowledge" among your coworkers, your neighbours, the people you hang out with and so on.

There are also hints that the trainer might have been the one putting the photos in the family album to make the husband realize and thus break up with the wife since all the photos are from the trainers perspective and at the end we see him taking a picture of her sucking his dick. Also this one is a bit more realistic then the other NTR's who leave pictures of themselves, here the trainer only leaves pictures of her and of them cheating but never of himself. Though the husband does catch him on film later on but it's illegal and a crime to cheat in JP so leaving evidence of being involved can get you sued and most often fired from your workplace and even having trouble getting a new job later on. Thats also one of the reasons why NTR is popular in JP since it's something "forbidden".

Well had a look at the translation that was rereleased a few days ago, and unless it's completely wrong then. The story starts with the husband going through their family photos only to find photos of his wife cheating on him. Then to make sure if it's true or not he puts a camera in their room and then eventually catches her cheating with the trainer at the gym. This goes on for a while and he jerks of to it and notices her telling no to something, the trainer wants to do her raw and cum inside of her but she say's no to it. Then the husband decides that he can't keep watching this and has to confront the wife. Then the last part is him feeling down about it all but not knowing what to do and goes to work. Then the trainer calls and they start having sex raw with the trainer promosing he'll pull out. The wife agree's but of course he cums inside of her telling her to get pregnant with his stronger seed and she goes yes yes! Then he tries to convince her to be with him but

She say's no never, I love my husband the most and I would never leave him and my daughter. But wouldn't your marriage be over if he ever finds out? I wouldn't worry about that since he's always so clueless. The end. Overall it feels like the wife wants rough sex but the husband isn't doing that so she tries to show him her cheating and how she likes it by putting her cheating photots into the family album but instead the husband awakens to a NTR fetish it would seem.
